articles.title: Apple just named a new AI chief with Google and Microsoft expertise, as John Giannandrea steps down - TechCrunch
articles.description: His replacement is Amar Subramanya, a highly regarded Microsoft executive who spent 16 years at Google, most recently leading engineering for the Gemini Assistant. It's a savvy hire, given that Subramanya knows the competition intimately.

articles.title: PlayStation Store "End of Year" Sale Delivers Over 4,000 Discounted Items - MP1st
articles.description: Sony has launched the PlayStation Store End of Year 2025 sale, bringing thousands of discounted items.

articles.title: When Will Apple Release iOS 26.2? - MacRumors
articles.description: We're getting closer to the launch of the final major iOS update of the year, with Apple set to release iOS 26.2 in December. We've had three...

articles.title: The Apple Watch Series 11 is $70 off, beating its Black Friday price - The Verge
articles.description: The Apple Watch Series 11 is even cheaper than it was on Black Friday, with the 42mm base configuration selling for $329 ($70 off) at Amazon and other retailers.

articles.title: LET IT DIE offline version announced - Gematsu
articles.description: An offline version of the free-to-play action game LET IT DIE is currently in production, publisher GungHo Online Entertainment and developer Supertrick Games announced.

articles.title: Here are 25 great laptop deals you can still grab before Cyber Monday ends - The Verge
articles.description: Cyber Monday is almost over, and it’s likely your last chance of the year to save big on MacBooks, Windows laptops, and gaming machines — including Asus models.

articles.title: As a PS5 Gamer, I’d Hate to Miss These PlayStation Cyber Monday Deals, and Time’s Almost Up - IGN
articles.description: Here's what's up for grabs now that PlayStation's official Cyber Monday 2025 sale is now live across all major retailers. This could be your last chance to save on consoles, games, accessories, and more.

articles.title: Netflix Won’t Let You Cast Shows From Your Phone to Your TV Anymore - WIRED
articles.description: The streaming giant quietly removed the feature that lets you control content on your TV screen using a mobile device. The company says the feature was not widely used.

articles.title: You can double your Switch 2’s storage with Samsung’s $40 microSD Express card - The Verge
articles.description: Cyber Monday has brought a great deal on Switch 2 microSD Express cards, particularly Samsung’s Mario-themed model in the 256GB configuration.

articles.title: MKBHD’s wallpaper app Panels is shutting down - TechCrunch
articles.description: From the time Brownlee launched Panels in September 2024, the app struggled to find an audience of its own. "We knew it was niche … and ultimately, we weren't able to turn it into the vision I had," Marques Brownlee said.

articles.title: Arc Games is now an independent publisher - GamesIndustry.biz
articles.description: Arc Games is establishing itself as an independent publisher.

articles.title: After a Witcher -free decade, CDPR still promises three sequels in six years - Ars Technica

articles.title: Despite Past Viral AI Fakes, This Grand Theft Auto 6 Leak Looks Real - GameSpot
articles.description: The clips aren't long and reveal nothing we don't already know, but they could be real GTA 6 footage.

articles.title: Amazon's Buy 2, Get 1 Free Board Games Sale Is the Best New Cyber Monday Deal - IGN
articles.description: Not only are lots of classic board games old and new in this "Buy 2, Get 1 Free" sale, but many of the prices are already marked down to begin with as well.
